text: Oun ni Eni ti O mu awon tâ€™o sai gbagbo ninu awon ahlu-l-kitab jade kuro ninu ile won fun ikojo akoko. Eyin ko lero pe won yoo jade. Awon naa si lero pe dajudaju awon odi ile won yoo daabo bo awon lodo Allahu. Sugbon Allahu wa ba won ni ibi ti won ko lero; Allahu si ju iberu sinu okan won. Won n fi owo ara won ati owo awon onigbagbo ododo wo awon ile won. Nitori naa, e woye, eyin ti e ni oju iriran
